title: In The Voice Of A Border District, A Story Of The Immigration Crisis
teaser: Rep. Pete Gallego of Texas represents a district that sprawls for 800 miles along the U.S.-Mexico border. He speaks to Audie Cornish about the border crisis as seen firsthand, suggesting the actions he'd like to see the White House and Congress take.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
